reviewText: I watched all the videos and was disappointed: they show the camera, it's buttons, what are those for, the menu setup etc. in a boring way. They do not show actual use of the functions and photo taking with results, just a few of so low quality of takes that does not acknowledge the greatness of this camera. I have found better videos in uTube. One of the speakers bites her nails and still shows her ugly fingernails in the macro take while walking through the buttons.
Given that there is really nothing on the market with training assistance for the E-3, I found the video helpful.  It  simplified some of the cryptic entries of the printed manual.
